definition: to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
(negative prefix for verbs)/have not/not
drowned/to end/to die/to inundate
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final

sentences.english: I was a little tired yesterday, but I'm OK now.
sentences.chinese: 昨天還有點累，現在沒事兒了。

sentences.english: We had just gotten to America and everybody else had gotten off.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛剛到達美國，別的人都沒事兒。

sentences.english: 'Don't worry,' I say to my wife.
We'd rather be talking to friends online than watching the clock.
sentences.chinese: 與其閒着沒事兒，我們更喜歡跟朋友在線交流。

sentences.english: That's all right, sis, " he answered jovially ."
sentences.chinese: “沒事兒，姐姐，”他快活地回答，錢用了又會來的。

sentences.english: I have trouble sleeping nights without a job.
sentences.chinese: 沒事兒幹，我晚上連覺都睡不好。

sentences.english: 'Don't worry, ' I say to my parents.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴我父母說‘沒事兒’。

sentences.english: Don't worry my love, go with the breakdown van !
sentences.chinese: 沒事兒，親愛的，坐救援車走吧。

sentences.english: If you tell me the truth, you won't get in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你跟我實話實說，我保你沒事兒。

sentences.english: A:The good news is the other 3 DVDs are ok.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是你借我的其它三DVD都沒事兒。

sentences.english: It's a piece of cake. Why not invite the Kongfu master Wu Song to give us a hand ?
sentences.chinese: 沒事兒，咱請功夫了得的武松助我一臂之力。

sentences.english: Don't worry, I was speaking to myself.
sentences.chinese: 沒事兒，別擔心，我剛在自言自語呢。

sentences.english: I sit there in idle, and I edit some code.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在那兒沒事兒幹，我編輯了一段代碼。

definition: boring/of no interest
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
bored/boring/senseless
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to go to bed/to sleep
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
subordinates in gang of bandits
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
hurriedly/without delay
to come in
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
erhua variant of 點|点[dian3]
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
to play/to have fun/to hang out
